name: Strawhart
description:
Strawhart is a first-person action-puzzler combining a rich narrative experience with gameplay that rewards ingenuity and skill. Depart on a well-intentioned quest to awaken a terrible evil. Wield a slew of versatile magicks and start a cult. Face off against over 75 mind-bending puzzles. Push your skills to the limit as you try to survive unforgiving finale encounters across four stylized worlds, each with their own stories to tell. Do you have what it takes to unravel the mystery of Strawhart?



Features:
  • Conquer over 75 mind-bending puzzles
  • Hide your growing cult from your mother
  • Test yourself against 4 unforgiving finale encounters
  • Fruitlessly bargain with an unknowable evil
  • Push your limits to complete ultra-challenging bonus objectives
  • Collect fragments of apocrypha to piece together the past
  • Wage your own personal war against the crate industry
